data.name: Pure Farming 2018 - Joskin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Make your Pure Farming 2018 bigger! For the first time, enhance your farming efficiency with 5 new machines from the JOSKIN brand.
The JOSKIN Pack includes:

- JOSKIN Volumetra 20 000 – Slurry Tanker
- JOSKIN Pendislide PRO – Spreading Boom
- JOSKIN Trans-KTP 27/55 – Tipping Trailer
- JOSKIN Silo-Space 2 – Silage Trailer
- JOSKIN Betimax RDS 7500 – Livestock Trailer

Once downloaded, one item of each new machine will be available in the in-game store for free. You can buy more with the in-game currency.

data.short_description: Make your Pure Farming 2018 bigger! For the first time, enhance your farming efficiency with 5 new machines from the JOSKIN brand.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,8,7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2,3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 GTX 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,8,7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I7, 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
